title: Taj Mahal
medium:
Medium: cotton, rayon, Lurex
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft patterning
description: Black with grey and white boucle yarns and copper-colored metallic film used as supplementary wefts that form wide horizontal bands. This fabrics was used as automobile upholstery for Ford Motor Company's 1959 Lincoln Continental.
name: Textile
